content.text:
# Crystal Wing Awards

}}
The Crystal Wing Awards () in Slovakia are annual awards that recognise personal accomplishments in the areas of social, cultural, economic and public life. The 20th edition of the awards, conceived by Mária Vaškovičová, was held in January 2017.
Categories and awards

* 2015 – Miroslava Hunčíková
* 2016 – Ondrej Vrábel
* 2017 – Marek Machata
* 2019 – Eva Klikáčová
* 2021 – Eva Gažová
